column5: I know that I wish to catch a PB for every species every year, but that's just dreaming.  My goal for 2015 is to catch a walleye through the ice and to catch a pike in the grand river.  Maybe catching a carp that's bigger then my PB(33").  Nailing a nice size catfish at Dunnville would be cool too, but this year I haven't had much luck.  What about you guys?
To spend even more time with my kids in the boat!

Not really a goal but more of a wish. To win the lottery, flip "work" the proverbial bird and spend enough time on the water with my kids and friends so my wife is left with no other option but to find herself a boyfriend  .  I got the business end of the wishbone at dinner last night so lets see what happens.
I have two very important goals. Every year, there is the goal to fish 10 new bodies of water. The better goal is to get out and go fishing with as many OFC members as I can this year.
My goal for 2015 is to make it through the year... without being incarcerated or certified !
You forgot bonafied. And stay out of the woolworth store.LOL  Work less harder (good luck with that) and just live life day by day.
To be a better father and husband....  Ohhh and break me pb pike.  G
My goal for 2015 is to make it through the year... without being incarcerated or certified !  I hear ya Wayne....lets hope this year is better!
For both of us and our kids fella !
fish lots with my kids, do alot of skating/hockey, be a good dad and hubby. just normal stuff really.  only thing im changing this year is no alcohol and no smokes
To find full time employment. For the love of god, please full time employment.  Fishing wise I'd love to see the sturgeon that lives my buddies dock and maybe ice +5lb plus lake trout.

Fishing wise, to concentrate my trips into fewer, but better planned and more memorable and hopefully successful ones.  Oh, and to enjoy every last waking moment of free time before the wee one arrives in July/August.
Congrats bud!
My goal is to get my 24x36 1/2 loft cabin framed and dried in. Hopefully I can get a friend or two to lend a hand. Doing it solo will probably kill me!!!!
I'm pulling for ya Wayne!
I'm pulling for ya Wayne!  Yeah, don't waste your time it's a lost cause!!!!!

My goal for 2015 would be to get out more!!!!  Work seems to get in the way far too often, and I need to spend more time on the water!!!\  We booked a trip at Fireside lodge this coming June, so I hope to get my personal best pike and musky!!!!  Also hope to get 1st place in a bass tourney this coming year!!!!!  It will be our 5th year, hope we can make it happen!!!!!
Guess you'd have to live it to understand Dave... hope you never have too!
Just kiddin' buddy. Lets hope all goes well for you and the fam in 2015.

My goal is to get my 24x36 1/2 loft cabin framed and dried in. Hopefully I can get a friend or two to lend a hand. Doing it solo will probably kill me!!!!  Whoo-Hee! I smell a good old fashioned OFC barn raisin' in the makin' here!! Come one come all (especially if you're Mennonite or Amish!), let's git er done!!
As always I resolve to lose no weight. Keep that 57 year streak going.  And not get a job.
If'n I git started by the end of the month, me and the Conestoga waggin should git thar by June.

Whoo-Hee! I smell a good old fashioned OFC barn raisin' in the makin' here!! Come one come all (especially if you're Mennonite or Amish!), let's git er done!!     If'n I git started by the end of the month, me and the Conestoga waggin should git thar by June.  Ya'll c'mon up!!! I'll fire up the still!!!!
